items.title: «une tentative de prise du pouvoir illégale (...) actuellement en cours»

“What a historic moment: welcome to all Cape Verdeans, for their first time at the World Cup,” “Your work in the football movement has been incredible over the past year, and now your stars will go global and raise a new generation of football lovers in Cape Verde”
"وقاحة ما بعدها وقاحة، فالمنطقة التي قتل فيها الأمريكيون ليست تحت سيطرتنا الأمنية، تحت السيطرة الإسرائيلية، شكلْتُ لجنة تضم جميع قادة الأجهزة الأمنية.."

"This unique exhibition in Romania explores one of the most fascinating subjects of universal ancient history: Pompeii, the city lost under Vesuvius' ash. Pompeii has become a fundamental symbol for modernity: its physical impermanence gave rise to a permanence of style, echoing across Europe through the Grand Tour. Pompeii thus becomes the archetype of art's triumph over catastrophe and destruction, of survival. The exhibition, realised in collaboration with the prestigious Italian institution Civita Mostre e Musei, explores the impact of cataclysms on civilisations, from the ancient tragedy of Pompeii to the ways this event has inspired European art and culture from the Grand Tour to contemporary times,"

“We see underwater and space applications as unique opportunities for thin-film PV to thrive, as the technology’s lightweight, flexible and durable design allows it to withstand the immense pressures and tempestuous conditions that define these environments,”
«con oltre 500 persone formate in due anni, la Regione Piemonte si conferma protagonista nella costruzione di una pubblica amministrazione più preparata , digitale e orientata al futuro»

«Un’iniziativa assunta di concerto con la Prefettura e le forze dell’ordine, sulla scia di quanto già discusso nei Comitati Provinciali per l’ordine e la sicurezza pubblica a seguito di alcuni episodi che si sono verificati quest’estate» «Il provvedimento rappresenta un segno tangibile di vicinanza alla cittadinanza e di attenzione verso alcune zone, con l’auspicio che porti a un miglioramento in termini di sicurezza. In base al monitoraggio dei prossimi mesi potrà essere oggetto di ulteriori approfondimenti ed eventuali evoluzioni»
„Bolurile de hrană interactivă pot reduce anxietatea și pot recrea nevoia naturală de explorare”
